item1.Description: Item within set of 12 to be presented on screen

item2.Description: Item within set of 12 to be presented on screen

item3.Description: Item within set of 12 to be presented on screen

item4.Description: Item within set of 12 to be presented on screen

item5.Description: Item within set of 12 to be presented on screen

item6.Description: Item within set of 12 to be presented on screen

order.Description: Indicates whether presentation starts with item1 or item4

Levels.1: Indicates item1 was presented first (followed immediately by item2 and item3), then item4
Levels.2: Indicates item4 was presented first (followed immediately by item5 and item6), then item1

order_resp.Description: Indicates whether the participant responded to the first order second order as correct

Levels.1: Pariticpant indicates the first set of items is correct
Levels.2: Pariticpant indicates the second set of items is correct

side.Description: The side of the screen the correct response is on

Levels.1: The correct response is on the left side of the screen
Levels.2: The correct response is on the right side of the screen

side_resp.Description: Side of the screen the participant responded as correct

Levels.1: Participant indicated the left side of the screen
Levels.2: Participant indicated the right side of the screen

acc.Description: Indicates the accuracy of the participant for a given trial

response_time.Description: Response to remember task (begins from first item onset)

reps.Description: Number of repetitions participant took for a given trial
